code: 'use client';import React,{useEffect}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Cursor(){useEffect(()=>{const link=document.querySelectorAll('.hover-this');const cursor=document.querySelector('.cursor');const animateit=function(e){const hoverAnim=this.querySelector('.hover-anim');const{offsetX:x,offsetY:y}=e;const{offsetWidth:width,offsetHeight:height}=this;const move=25;const xMove=x/width*(move*2)-move;const yMove=y/height*(move*2)-move;hoverAnim.style.transform="translate(".concat(xMove,"px, ").concat(yMove,"px)");if(e.type==='mouseleave')hoverAnim.style.transform='';};const editCursor=e=>{const{clientX:x,clientY:y}=e;cursor.style.left=x+'px';cursor.style.top=y+'px';};link.forEach(b=>b.addEventListener('mousemove',animateit));link.forEach(b=>b.addEventListener('mouseleave',animateit));window.addEventListener('mousemove',editCursor);document.querySelectorAll('a, .cursor-pointer').forEach(el=>{el.addEventListener('mousemove',()=>{cursor.classList.add('cursor-active');});el.addEventListener('mouseleave',()=>{cursor.classList.remove('cursor-active');});});},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"cursor"});}export default Cursor;
